loans.name: Clementine

texts.en: Clementine is 33 years old. She sells clothes, most especially bitenge (traditional African clothing) for ladies. She is married to a driver, and they have two children. With the loan, she would like to buy more bitenge for sale. The profits from the business will be used to build a house.

loans.use: To buy more ladies' clothes commonly known as bitenge for sale.

loans.name: Stephen

texts.en:
Stephen is a 34-year-old married man with two children. He lives in Kamwenge, Uganda. He has been operating a retail shop since 1999 alongside practicing agriculture to earn a better living. He hopes to grow his business into a wholesale shop in the future, but lack of enough capital and unpredictable weather changes are major challenges he faces. 

Stephen is requesting a loan to buy more retail shop items like sugar, rice, soap and crates of soda to sell.

loans.use: to buy more retail shop items like sugar, rice, soap and crates of soda to sell.

loans.name: Enatha

texts.en:
Enatha is 28 years old. She is married and has four children between the ages of six months and seven years. 

She has sold foodstuffs for the past seven years. With the loan she would like to buy more foodstuffs. The profits from the business will be saved.

loans.use: to buy foodstuffs to sell.

loans.name: Thacienne

texts.en: Thacienne is 33 years old. She is married with four children, and they all go to school. With the loan, she would like to buy more sorghum for sale. The profits from the business will be used to buy a milling machine.

loans.use: To buy more sorghum for sale.

loans.name: Neonita

texts.en:
Neonita is a dried fish vendor from the town of Bien Unido, Bohol. Neonita is a married woman and a mother of two children. 

Neonita is asking for a loan to buy more fish to dry and sell. With a loan, she will be able to improve her stocks, allowing her to sell more to her buyers and increase her sales and income.

loans.use: to buy more fish to dry and sell.

loans.name: David

texts.en: David is a married man with six children living in Kasese, Uganda. He works in the agricultural sector and generates additional income through house rentals. He hopes to educate his children to the university level; however, limited capital and bad weather are his challenges. David is requesting a loan to pay school fees for his children.

loans.use: to pay school fees for his children.

loans.name: Jeannette

texts.en: Jeannette is 25 years old. She sells beers and has been in the business for the past two years. With the loan, she would like to buy more beers for sale. With the profits, she would like to own a depot for beers as a sole distributor.

loans.use: To buy more beers for sale.

loans.name: Sebastian

texts.en: Sebastian is a 45-year-old married man with five children, four of whom go to school. He lives in Kasese, Uganda. He has been a teacher for ten years and does farming on the side to generate additional income. With his limited salary, he has managed to keep his children in school. His major challenges are long distances to his work place and delayed salary. Sebastian's plan is to specialize in commercial agriculture. Sebastian is requesting a loan to pay the school fees for his children.

loans.use: to pay school fees for his children.

loans.name: Mbalu

texts.en:
Greetings from Sierra Leone! This is 27-year-old Mbalu from the Waterloo eastern area of Freetown. She is married and has three children between the ages of one and 11, two of whom attend school. 

She started a cookery business to help her family survive day-to-day. She sells food at her house and has been running this business since 2005. She works at the business beginning at 4:30 and will not rest until the food is finished.  Mbalu says the main challenge to her business is price controls in the market.

Mbalu has requested a loan in order to buy food commodities such as cooking seasonings, oil and rice. The extra income from this loan will allow her to educate her children. In the future, she plans to have a big cookery shop. She thanks you for your support!

loans.use: to buy food commodities such as cooking seasonings, oil and rice.

loans.name: Fatmata

texts.en:
This is 38-year-old Fatmata from Waterloo, eastern area, in Freetown. She is married with two children, ages 5 years and 9 years. She began this business because she wanted to stop sitting at home as a housewife and create a source of income to support the home.

Fatmata runs a general store; she sells drinks, cigarettes, biscuits and soap. She has been running this business since three years ago. She works at the business every day, from morning to night. She says that the main challenge to her business is price inflation.

Fatmata has requested a loan in order to purchase items such as drinks, cigarettes, biscuits and soap. The extra income from this loan will allow her to pay her children's school fees and improve her standard of living. In the future, she plans to open a big shop. She appreciates your support.

loans.use: to purchase items such as drinks, cigarettes, biscuits and soap.

loans.name: Isatu

texts.en:
Greetings from Sierra Leone! This is 32-year-old Isatu from Waterloo, Eastern area, in Freetown. She is married with three children between the ages of 1 year and 7 years. 

Isatu runs a wood business; she sells charcoal and wood. She has been running this business for six years. She works at the business nine hours per day and 7 days per week. Isatu says that the main challenge to her business is the problem of transportation -- to travel with her charcoal during the rainy season when sometimes vehicles break on the way.

Isatu has requested a loan in order to purchase charcoal and wood. The extra income from this loan will allow her to increase her business and educate her children. In the future, she plans to change her business to clothing sales. She thanks you for your support!

loans.use: to purchase charcoal and wood.

loans.name: Abioseh

texts.en:
This is Abioseh from the Waterloo eastern area of Freetown. She is in her late forties. She is married and has five children between the ages of 12 and 24. She began this business because she wants to create a permanent source of income.

Abioseh runs a general store selling drinks, cigarettes, biscuits and soap. She has been running this business for 11 years. She works at the business every day, 12 hours per day. The main challenge to her business is price inflation.

Abioseh has requested a loan to purchase items such as drinks, cigarette, biscuit and soap. The extra income from this loan will allow her to increase her business and change her family's living situation. In the future, she plans to open a shop. She appreciates your support.

loans.use: to purchase items, such as drinks, cigarettes, biscuits and soap, to sell in her store.

loans.name: Rehana

texts.en: Rehana deals in the business of the purchasing and sale of animals with the support of her husband. She buys animals (baby goats and baby cows) at low prices, brings them up and then sells them out in the market at higher prices. She has gradually improved her business with the support of Kashf Foundation; currently, she has one cow, two buffaloes and three goats. In order to purchase one more baby cow, she requested a loan of 30,000 PKR (Pakistani rupees). She is in her fourth loan cycle with good repayment history. She hopes to grow her business and dreams of giving a good and quality education to her three children through all her hard work in her business.

loans.use: to purchase one more baby cow.

loans.name: Yary's Group

texts.en:
Originally from a rural village in the Ek Phnom district of the Battambang province, Yary is a 25-year-old married mother of two children. She and her husband have been selling chicken meat in the village. Together, they have been in this business for two years.
 
Yary is leading a group of two members who live in the same village. Yary has been with VisionFund for one cycle. She completely paid back her past loan which helped her to better support her family. As the leader, she is going to use her portion of the loan to buy more chicken meat to sell. With this loan, she hopes to increase her income to improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to buy more chicken meat to resell.

loans.name: Ramaz

texts.en: Ramaz is 28 years old. He is hardworking and determined, with a will to get ahead in life. He lives in the coastal city of Batumi with his parents. His mother is a teacher and receives a small monthly income. The father has chronic health problems and receives monthly assistance from the local government. Ramaz sells basic groceries in a store located in a crowded street in Batumi. His clients are locals, as well as holiday-makers. Summertime is high season in Batumi, and his business profits allow Ramaz to help his parents with the household expenses. His plan now is to continue to work on his business and to make it grow. Ramaz applied for credit to MFO Credo. His application was approved in the framework of the Start Up program, which is a joint initiative with Kiva, permitting vulnerable poors to start or re-start businesses. A loan of $2,000 will help Ramaz to improve his store and enlarge the quantity of products he offers. He will buy supplies, including sugar, soft drinks and snacks, to stock his store in a better way. With this financial support, Ramaz will expand his grocery store and attract more customers. He promises to make his repayments on time.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise to stock his store better.

loans.name: Elizabeta

texts.en:
Elizabeta, this Egyptian and responsible young woman, just finished paying off the previous loan; she wants to thank all of her lenders for helping her out. Now she is requesting another loan for the same reason.
Elizabeta is being photographed here with her children.

loans.use: to buy used clothes, accessories and housewares to resell.

loans.name: Raphaelkro Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe Raphaelkro fait partie de la coopérative CAAM qui est située à Meagui, une petite ville au sud-ouest de la Côte d’Ivoire dans la région de San Pedro. Le groupe est composé de 5 personnes. 
Patrice a 69 ans. Il s’occupe de 9 personnes dans son foyer. Cela fait 5 ans qu’il fait partie de la coopérative CAAM et il a 12 hectares de cacao certifiés Rainforest Alliance et UTZ, ce qui veut dire qu’il respecte les principes et les normes de l’agriculture durable. 

Grace au crédit, il va pouvoir acheter de l’engrais pour sa plantation. Ces produits vont lui permettre d’augmenter sa production et ainsi d’accroître ses revenus. 

Avec l’argent supplémentaire, il va acheter des tôles pour couvrir sa maison
texts.en:
The Raphaelkro group is part of the CAAM cooperative which is located in Meagui, a small town in the south-west of Côte d'Ivoire, in the San Pedro area. The group consists of 5 people.

Patrice is 69 years old. He takes care of nine people in his home. He has been part of the CAAM cooperative for the past five years and owns 12 hectares (30 acres) of cocoa which are Rainforest Alliance and UTZ Certified, which means he complies with the principles and standards of sustainable agriculture.

Thanks to the loan, he will be able to buy fertilizer for his plantation. These products will enable him to increase his production and thereby increase his revenues.

With the extra money, he will buy corrugated sheets to cover his house.

loans.use: buy fertilizer

loans.name: Jamal Eddine

texts.en:
Jamal Eddine is a 26-year-old married father of two children. He has been working in tailoring, and installing curtains since five years ago.
In 2009, he started his own business, to improve his living and provide his family with the best living.  His children are enrolled in a private school, and his wife helps him in his business, which means there is no additional external income to financially support the family. 
That's why he has to put so much effort to develop his business to keep it upon customers satisfaction.
Today, Jamal Eddine is applying for a youth loan from Kiva's partner Al Majmoua, in order to increase his business merchandise with new released curtain designed textiles and accessories.
He hopes to keep on developing his business and providing his family with the best living ever.

loans.use: To increase his business merchandise with new released curtain designed textiles and accessories

loans.name: Nawal

texts.en: Nawal is a 24 year-old married mother of one child living in a village in the Bekaa Valley. She works as a hairdresser, based in her own house. Her husband is an employee in a company. Nawal decided to contact Al Majmoua and acquire a youth loan in order to enhance her business. In fact, the loan would provide her with a new work kit and make up kit that is up to date with the trends of the market. As for the future, Nawal wishes to open up her own beauty salon.

loans.use: to buy new work kit and make up kit that is up to date with the trends of the market

loans.name: Ramziya

texts.en:
Ramziya is a 33-year-old, married mother of two children. For ten years, she has been working in the business of selling accessories, bags, and cosmetics.

Ramziya is a hard-working woman, who puts so much effort to help her husband in making their living and developing their socioeconomic situation. 
Both her children are enrolled in public school because her income, combined with her husband’s, aren’t enough to cover private schools' tuition fees, in addition to the family’s needs.

Ramziya is applying for a loan from Kiva’s partner, Al Majmoua Lebanese Association for Development, to help her husband in developing his business by paying for necessary maintenance on his business-based machines, he owns a bobcat and a forklift, and they are his business based tools so they have to be in a good situation to keep on providing them with a good income. She is sure that this loan will help her develop her family’s socioeconomic situation, since her husband will be capable of developing his business upon his customers’ needs and requests.

loans.use: to help her husband in developing his business by paying for necessary maintenance on his business-based machines.

loans.name: Salam

texts.en:
Salam is a conservative woman, so she let her husband take her place in the picture. Salam was born in 1978. She is married and has three daughters. Her husband is in the military, and he also works in computer and printer repair. 

Salam has been repairing computers and printers and manufacturing ink for ten years. She started her project at her own store. However, because of the nature of her work, she moved her job to her home. Salam is looking forward to expanding her project in the future. 

She is currently seeking a loan to buy new ink machines and replacement parts for the computers and printers, as she doesn't have enough money to buy them.

loans.use: to buy new ink machines and replacement computer and printer parts.

loans.name: Lubna

texts.en:
Lubna is a 28-year-old woman who lives in Pakistan with her husband and daughter. Her husband is a government employee whose income is too low to cover their household expenses. Lubna herself has been running a beauty salon for two years to help her husband to cover the cost of household expenses. She has excellent beautician skills. All her customers appreciate her services.

She has requested a loan from Kiva's partner BRAC Pakistan to purchase cosmetic products like lipstick, facial creams, etc. as well as chairs for her salon. With the profits she will first pay back her loan to Kiva. Lubna's dream is to provide better future to her children. She wants to thank all the BRAC staff for being so co-operative.

loans.use: to purchase cosmetic products like lipstick, facial creams, etc.

loans.name: Afaf

texts.en:
Afaf is a conservative woman, so she let her husband take her place in the picture. Afaf is 45 years old. She is married and has 3 children. She lives in Zarqa-Jordan with her husband, who is in the the military and works at the same time as an electrician.

Afaf has worked in accessory sales in the past, and she has been selling eggs and chickens for 10 years. Afaf is not getting enough income because of the small number of chickens she has. So, she is planning to buy more chickens in order to increase her productivity, which brings her a better income. As she doesn’t have enough money to buy them, she is requesting a loan to buy them.

loans.use: to buy more chickens.

loans.name: Nawal

texts.en:
Nawal is a conservative woman, so she let her husband take her place in the picture. Nawal was born in 1974. She is married and lives in Zarqa, Jordan. Her husband works as a driver and has a snack bar. 

Nawal has been working making decorations for packaging and snack cartons for two years. She started her project by making accessories which was profitable to her. So she started to create other forms. Nawal is currently requesting a loan to open her own store in the future.

loans.use: to open her own accessories store.

loans.name: Comite De Pesee Sampathe Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe de crédit COMITE DE PESEE SAMPATHE  regroupe 3 femmes qui se sont réunis parce appartenant à la même famille. Leur activité consiste à faire du commerce.
FATOU, qui dirige le groupe, s’identifie par sa main levée sur la photo, exerce cette activité depuis 8 ans. Elle fait de la vente de produits alimentaires comme le riz, le sucre, l'huile et le savon . Elle fait ce métier pour aider son mari dans la gestion de la dépense quotidienne du foyer. Elle commence sa journée à 8h pour la terminer à 18h. Elle a comme ambition d’ouvrir une boutique de produits cosmétiques avec l’appui des préteurs.
texts.en:
Comite De Pesee Sampathe Group is made up of three women who got together because they belong to the same family. They are merchants.

Fatou, the group's leader, is the one raising her hand in the photograph. She's been a merchant for eight years. She sells food products, such as rice, sugar, oil, and soap.

She runs this business in order to help her husband cover the daily expenses of her household. She starts her day at 8 in the morning, and finishes at 6 in the evening.

With help from the loaners, she ambitions to open a cosmetics shop.

loans.use: to buy food products, such as rice, sugar, oil, and soap

loans.name: Ismoil

texts.ru: Исмоилу 48 лет. Он работает продавцом парфюмерного магазина. Он женат и имеет семерых детей. У него шесть дочерей и один сын. Старшая его дочь студентка, вторая дочь вместе с отцом занимается продажей, остальные дочери и сын учатся в школе. Исмоил в 2005 году начал свой торговый бизнес и уже 8 лет как продвигает этот бизнес. Рядом с центральным рынком у него имеется парфюмерный магазин, где он вместе с дочерью продает женский и мужской парфюм, краски для волос и т.д. Прибыль с бизнеса является единственным источником дохода семьи. Исмоил запрашивает кредит, чтобы увеличить товарооборот. На сумму кредита он собирается увеличить ассортимент парфюмерии на продажу.
texts.en: Ismoil is 48 years old. He works as a salesman of a cosmetics store. He is married and has seven children. He has six daughters and one son. His oldest daughter is a student, his second daughter works together with her father and the rest of the children go to school. Ismoil has started his trading business in 2005 and has been growing it for eight years now. He has a cosmetics store next to the central market where he with his daughter sell women's and men's perfumes, hair colors and etc. The profit from the business is the only source of income for their family. Ismoil is asking for a loan to increase sales volume. He wants to increase the variety of goods for sale using the loan.

loans.use: to purchase a variety of cosmetics to increase sales volume.

loans.name: Mayram

texts.ru: Майраму 46 лет. Она разведена и имеет 2 детей. Дети совершеннолетние. Ее дочь замужем и имеет детей. Ее сын студент и успешно учится в университете. Майрам по специальности медсестра, но так как ее зарплата была маленькой и не хватала для содержания семьи, она начала заниматься бизнесом. Вот еже в течение 8 лет она занимается купле продажей сельхоз продуктов. Она торгует на местном рынке и имеет своих клиентов, которые довольны ее товарами. Она должна оплатить за учебный договор своего сына Акрама, но не имеет денег. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 1200 долларов США для оплаты учебного договора. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Mayram is 46 years old. She is divorced and has two children who are adults. Her daughter is married and has children. Her son is a student and is studying successfully in the university. Mayram is a nurse by profession, but because her salary is so small and was not enough for their family she has started her own business. During the eight years she has been buying and selling field crops. She is selling on the local market and has own customers who are happy with her produce. She has to pay for the tuition for her son Akram who does not have money. She is asking for a loan for an amount of $1,200 USD to pay for her sons education. She is waiting for your kindness.

loans.use: to pay for her son’s education.

loans.name: Bineta

texts.fr: Madame   BINETA   est   une  femme mariée sénégalaise      qui   évolue  dans  le  secteur  du    commerce    depuis   10  ans.  Son   activité   consiste  à   vendre   des    jus  et  des  crèmes   glacées.   Avec   les  revenus  de  cette  activité   elle  réussit   à    supporter    ses   charges   de  transport.  Elle est membre d’un guichet de l’UIMCEC  ou elle sollicite un crédit de  50000 frs. le financement   servira  à  acheter  des  condiments   pour  la préparation du jus qu’elle commercialise. Elle souhaite a l’aide de ses bénéfices diversifier les produits qu’elle vend, et  épargner de l’argent.  Elle projette d’ouvrir une cantine dans le futur.
texts.en:
Mrs. Bineta is a young Senegalese woman. She's married and has been a merchant for ten years. Her business consists in selling juice and ice cream.

With the income generated by this business, she manages to cover her transport expenses. She's a member of the local branch of Kiva's partner, the MFI UIMCEC, from which she's seeking a loan of XOF 50'000.

This loan will be used to buy condiments to make the juices that she sells. Thanks to her profits, she wishes to diversify her product offering, and put money away.

In the future, she plans to open a small store known as a "cantine".

loans.use: to buy condiments to make juice

loans.name: Inoyat

texts.ru:
Иноят трудолюбивая и скромная женщина.   Она изо  дня в день трудиться чтобы прокормить свою семью.  Иноят торгует на рынке женской одеждой, ее лавка находиться на центральном рынке, торгует на небольшом участке. К сожалению ее дочь после неудачного брака вернулась к матери с ребенком  и живет с Иноят.  Но Иноят надеется на лучшее, она  планирует накопить денежных средств и  купить ей через несколько лет квартиру, чтобы она там жила со своим ребенком. 
 Иноят торгует на рынке , но получаемая прибыль не достаточна для осуществления ее планов. Для  этого она обратилась в Арванд, чтобы увеличить свой товарооборот, тем самым увеличивая свой капитал.  Она хочет на полученный кредит приобрести летний товар женской одежды. Она всячески благодарит за поддержку Арванд и надеется на дальнейшее сотрудничество для развития своего дела.
texts.en:
Inoyat is a hardworking and modest woman. She is working hard every day to feed her family. Inoyat sells women's clothing on the market, her vendor space is located on the central market and she sells on small area. Unfortunately her daughter has come back with a child after an unsuccessful marriage and lives with Inoyat. But Inoyat hopes for the better and plans to save enough money to buy her an apartment in a few years so she can live there with her child.

Inoyat sells on the market, but the profit is not enough to make her plans come to reality. That's why she has come to Arvand to increase her sales volume and by that increase her capital. She wants to buy women's summer clothing using the loan. She is thanking Arvand for the support and hopes for further cooperation in growing of her business.

loans.use: to buy women's clothing.

loans.name: Shamma

texts.en:
Shamma is a 42-year-old married woman and a mother of six children. She has been stitching clothes for many years. She stitches for the people of her community and uses the income to support her entire family. To cope with the increasing demands of her customers, she needs to purchase more spools of threads in different colors with the packs of laces, zippers and buttons. For this reason, she requested a loan of Rs 20,000 to Kashf Foundation. It will help her to stitch up more dresses on time. 

Shamma is hopeful to get an increase in her earnings and wishes to provide good and quality education to her children.

loans.use: to purchase more spools of thread in different colors with the packs of laces, zippers and buttons.

loans.name: Cu

texts.en:
Cu is 53 years old. She has two children who have their own families. Her husband is a construction worker to earn a living and earns about 5,000,000 VND per month. Cu grows rice and makes food to sell. She earns about 4,000,000 VND per month. Aside from that, she breeds pigs to earn more money. Her family’s total earnings are about 9,000,000 VND per month. 

Cu’s challenges in life and work are a lack of capital to invest in her business and she does not have a location from which to sell food. Her dream is to open a big restaurant. This loan is one of the steps that will help her reach this dream. Cu is a hardworking woman and a passionate businesswoman.

Cu has participated in SEDA's credit program since 2009. In her last loan cycle, she was loaned 9,632,000 VND. In this loan cycle, she would like to borrow 10,080,000 VND to buy more ingredients to cook foods and breads. Cu would like to increase her earnings and save her profits for her family.

loans.use: to buy more ingredients to cook foods and breads.

loans.name: Getrude

texts.en:
Gertrude is a 35-year-old married woman with five children who lives in Kasese, Uganda. She has been a teacher for 15 years and does farming as a side business. Hardworking as she is, Gertrude has educated her children and bought land with her meager salary. 

A low salary and poor working conditions are his major constraints while her dream is to venture into modernized agriculture. Gertrude is requesting a loan to buy building materials such as bricks and sand for the construction of her residential house.

loans.use: to buy building materials such as bricks and sand for the construction of her residential house.

loans.name: Amos

texts.en: Amos is 25 years old. He owns a bar and has been running the bar for the past one and a half years. He would like to buy more beers and sodas for sale. The profits from the business will be used to reinvest in the business.

loans.use: To buy more beers and sodas for sale.

loans.name: Kpanda 2 Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe Kpanda 2 fait partie de la coopérative COOBADI et est située à Divo, une petite ville à l’est de la Côte d’Ivoire à environ 2 heures de route d’Abidjan. Le groupe est composé de 10 personnes. 
Tiecoura a 24 ans et il est un membre du groupe Kpanda 2. Il s‘occupe de 4 personnes dans son foyer. Cela fait 1 ans qu’il fait partie de la coopérative COOBADI et il a 3 hectares de cacao.

Grace au crédit, il va pouvoir acheter de l’engrais pour sa plantation. Ces produits vont lui permettre d’augmenter sa production et ainsi d’accroître ses revenus. 

Avec l’argent supplémentaire, il veut construire une maison.
texts.en:
The Kpanda 2 group is part of the COOBADI cooperative and is located in Divo, a small town in the East of Côte d'Ivoire about 2 hours driving time from Abidjan. The group consists of 10 people.

Tiecoura is 24 years old and is a member of the Kpanda 2 group. He takes care of four people in his home. He has been part of the COOBADI cooperative for one year and he owns 3 hectares (7.5 acres)  of cocoa.

Thanks to the loan, he will be able to buy fertilizer for his plantation. These products will enable him to increase his production and thereby increase his revenues.

With the extra money, he wants to build a house.

loans.use: buy fertilizer

loans.name: Kadiatu

texts.en:
Meet 30-year-old Kadiatu from Waterloo eastern area in Freetown. She is married with four children aged 6 and 13. In 2003, Kadiatu established her food stock business. She began her business because she did not go school and she was trained in business. She works at the business from 8:00am until 7:00pm, seven days per week. She says that the main challenges to her business are price inflation and high cost of transportation.

Kadiatu requires a loan in order to purchase rice, cooking seasoning and palm oil to expand her business. She hopes that the extra income from this loan will allow her to change her status of living and increase her business. In the future, Kadiatu plans to expand her business more. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to purchase rice, cooking seasoning and palm oil to expand her business.

loans.name: Charlotte

texts.en: Charlotte is 30 years old. She owns a bar and has been in the business for the past two years. She would like to buy more beers for sale. The profits from the business will be used to buy cattle for rearing.

loans.use: to buy more beers for sale.

loans.name: Michelkro Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe Michelkro fait partie de la coopérative COOBADI et est située à Divo, une petite ville au centre de la Côte d’Ivoire à environ 2 heures de route d’Abidjan. Le groupe est composé de 4 personnes. 
Oumar a 45 ans et il est un membre du groupe Michelkro. Il s‘occupe de 10 personnes dans son foyer. Cela fait 2 ans qu’il fait partie de la coopérative COOBADI et il a 4 hectares de cacao. 

Grace au crédit, il va pouvoir acheter de l’engrais pour sa plantation. Ces produits vont lui permettre d’augmenter sa production et ainsi d’accroître ses revenus. 

Avec l’argent supplémentaire, il veut construire une cour familiale, scolariser tous ses enfants et continuer à toujours mettre de l'engrais dans son champs.
texts.en:
Michelkro Group is part of the Coobadi Cooperative, and is located in Divo, a small town in central Côte d'Ivoire, about two hours from Abidjan.

The group is made up of four people. Oumar, age 45, is one of them. He takes care of ten people in his household. For two years, he's been a member of 
Coobadi Cooperative. He owns four hectares of cocoa.

Thanks to this loan, he will be able to buy fertilizers for his plantation. Theses products will enable him to bolster his production, and thus increase his income.

With the extra money, he wants to build a family courtyard, send all his children to school, and continue to put fertilizers in his field.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers

loans.name: Hermankono Diès 3 Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe Hermankono Diès 3 fait partie de la coopérative COOBADI et est située à Divo, une petite ville à l’est de la Côte d’Ivoire à environ 2 heures de route d’Abidjan. Le groupe est composé de 2 personnes. 
ISSOUF a 31 ans et il est un membre du groupe Hermankono Diès 3. Il s‘occupe de 14 personnes dans son foyer. Cela fait 2 ans qu’il fait partie de la coopérative COOBADI et il a 12 hectares de cacao certifié UTZ, ce qui veut dire qu’il respecte les principes et les normes de l’agriculture durable. 

Grace au crédit, il va pouvoir acheter de l’engrais pour sa plantation. Ces produits vont lui permettre d’augmenter sa production et ainsi d’accroître ses revenus. 

Avec l’argent supplémentaire, il veut construire une maison.
texts.en:
Hermankono Diès 3 Group is part of the Coobadi Cooperative, and is located in Divo, a small town on the east coast of Côte d'Ivoire, at about two hours by car from Abidjan.

The group has two members. Issouf, age 31, is one of them. He takes care of 14 people in his household. For two years, he's been a member of Coobadi Cooperative. He owns 12 hectares of UTZ-certified cocoa, which means he respects the principles and standards of sustainable agriculture.

Thanks to this loan, he will be able to buy fertilizers for his plantation. These products will enable him to bolster his production, and thus increase his income.

With the extra money, he would like to build a house.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers

loans.name: Vianka Lucia

texts.es: Vianka es una mujer emprendedora, exitosa, es madre soltera de dos hijos de 12 y 6 años de edad, su negocio es la venta de variedades como ropa, cosméticos, zapatos, ropa variada etc. tiene 4 años de tener su negocio y este crédito lo invertirá en la compra de productos varios como zapatos de varón, zapatos de niños, zapatos de mujer, camisas de varón, pantalón de varón, pantalón de damas, etc. su mama le ayuda atender su negocio, con el préstamo anterior le realizo mejoras a su vivienda y remodelo el local donde tiene su tienda en el mismo domicilio.
texts.en: Vianka is an enterprising, successful  woman. She is the single mother of two children, aged 12 and 6 years old. Her business is selling a variety of things such as clothes, cosmetics, shoes, etc. She has had her business for 4 years and she will invest this loan in buying various products such as men's shoes, children's shoes, women's shoes, men's shirts, men's pants, women's pants, etc. With the previous loan, she made improvements to her home and remodeled the locale where she has a store in her residence.

loans.use: to invest in buying men's shoes, children's shoes, women's shoes, men's shirts, men's pants, women's pants, etc.

loans.name: Polleritas Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “POLLERITAS”  iniciará el vigésimo cuarto ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Collpani, está compuesta por nueve integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Hortensia es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: venta de carteras, tienda de barrio, comercio, costura y chicharrones,  venta de ropa, venta de chompas, tienda de abarrotes.

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Hortensia es integrante, ella indica que hace doce años que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por invitación de su amiga que es parte de la institución. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de venta de chicharrones (frituras); cuenta que este negocio lo aprendió hace varios años atrás, al ver la necesidad económica que implicaba el divorcio que tuvo, este negocio lo emprendió con la ayuda de sus hijos.
 
El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra frituras) que adquirirá de las empresas distribuidoras de la Ciudad de El Alto, por mayor, y posteriormente a la elaboración lo comercializará en su espacio de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para mantener en lo posible a su hogar pues ella es divorciada y tiene cuatro hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta las capacitaciones, el crédito y el área de salud.
texts.en:
The “POLLERITAS” communal bank will begin its twentieth cycle in Pro Mujer, as a part of the Collpani center. It is made up of nine members and led by a board of directors of which Hortensia in the president. The businesses the members of the association have are varied. Among them are: selling wallets, a neighborhood store, sales, sewing and chicharrones,  selling clothes, selling groceries.

The loan they will take out will benefit the micro-businesswomen. Hortensia is a member. She indicates that two years ago, she joined Pro Mujer at the invitation of her friend who is a part of the institution. Right now, she has a business selling chicharrones (fried pork). She says that she learned this business several years ago when she saw the financial need that she incurred by her divorce. She started the business with the help of her children.  
 
The loan she will take out now is for an increase of capital by buying pork that she will acquire wholesale from distributors in the city of El Alto. Later she will prepare it and sell it in her sales space. This type of work will allow her to generate income to support her home as much as she can. She is divorced and has four children.

When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she says that she likes the trainings, the loans and the health topics.

loans.use: to buy fried pork.

loans.name: Alberto

texts.es: El joven Alberto de 21 años de edad estado civil soltero con una instrucción de nivel primario, vive más de 4 años en la comunidad de Colomi en su casa propia.                                                                                                                                                                                                                               Alberto se dedica a la producción agrícola de papa, papaliza y haba siembra en 3 has de terreno herencia de parte de sus padres anualmente tiene ingresos económicos por la venta estacional de la venta de sus productos agrícolas; El joven Alberto recientemente mejoro la construcción de su vivienda que invirtió el ahorro que tenia de la venta de sus productos y no le alcanzo ya para comprar insumos agrícolas abono orgánico mas semilla de papa. Alberto solicita el crédito para la compra de abono orgánico, esto le permitirá tener un buen ingreso y continuar mejorando su calidad de vida.
texts.en: Alberto is 21 years old, single and has a primary education. He has lived for more than 4 years in the community of Colomi in his own house.                                                                                                                                                                                                                             Alberto works growing potatoes, ullocos, and beans. He plants on land he inherited from his parents. He has annual income from the seasonal sale of his agricultural products. Alberto recently improved the construction on his house investing money that he saved from selling his products, and he didn't have enough to buy agricultural materials such as organic fertilizer and potato seed. Alberto will ask for the loan to buy organic fertilizer. This will allow him to have a good income and continuing to improve his quality of life.

loans.use: to buy organic fertilizer.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy sugar, beans, peas and flour for restocking her business.

loans.name: Hawa

texts.en:
Greetings from Sierra Leone! This is 41-year-old Hawa from the Waterloo eastern area in Freetown. She is married with 8 children between the ages of 6 years and 24 years. Three of her children are currently attending school. She started this business to assist in the daily survival of her family.
 
Hawa runs a local food business she sells local food within the community. She has been running this business for 15 years. She works at the business from 4:30 am and she will not rest until the food is finished. Hawa says that the main challenge to her business is the problem of price control in the market.

Hawa has requested a loan in order to acquire food commodities like cooking seasoning, oil and cassava. The extra income from this loan will allow her to educate her children. In the future, she plans to own a big cookery shop. She thanks you for your support!

loans.use: to acquire food commodities like cooking seasoning, oil and cassava.

loans.name: Hadijah

texts.en:
Hadijjah is a 37 years-old widow with four children all going to school and currently living in Kasese, Uganda. She has been in the salt business for twelve years, which is located in a rural area, and also does a motorcycle transport business as additional income. 

Hardworking as she is, she started the business to support her family and hopes to educate her children to the university level. Bad weather is her challenge. Hadijjah is requesting a loan  to buy crude salt to sell.

loans.use: to buy  crude salt to sell.

loans.name: Jerusha

texts.en:
Jerusha lives in the Nkubu area of Kenya, which grows a lot of "miraa," which can be chewed like tobacco. She has two children and has been doing this work for six years. Her primary income sources are milk, eggs, tea, crops and transportation services.

She stated what is most enjoyable about farming, and she said it was making ends meet by providing for her family. Her biggest challenge is drought. An animal on the farm has been given the names of Jacky.

Jerusha was asked why she chose Juhudi Kilimo for this loan, to which she replied: "Low interest rates and convenient repayment periods." This client was also asked what was learned during Juhudi's required micro-finance training session: "I should do my best to ensure that I benefit from the loan."

Her highest monthly expense is school fees. When asked "How will this loan benefit her family?" Jerusha replied: "We will improve our farming practices."

As part of Juhudi's loan appraisal process, each borrower's assets are evaluated. Jerusha owns the following: cow, poultry and motorcycle, but does not own a pig, pump, bicycle or automobile. Juhudi Kilimo also tries to measure any change in living standards based on this loan. This borrower has in the household a mosquito net, electricity, sewing machine and TV, but does not have solar power, running water or DVD.

Note: To create this loan profile, Juhudi Kilimo used a mobile device to gather information in the field and send the data to a central online repository, thus reducing paper use, making the process more efficient, and keeping costs down.

loans.use: To purchase a water tank.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a dairy cow

loans.name: Joanna

texts.en:
Joanna lives in Sanniquelle, the capital city of Nimba County, which is rich in nature resources. Living conditions are much better than in the capital city of Liberia, and it is the second largest populated county in Liberia.

Joanna is 40 years old. She stopped her education at 8th grade. She is married and has ten children between the ages of 25 and 7 years old. Only five of her children are in school. She managed to established her business with a little money from her husband, who is a teacher. She says she learned her way of selling from friends. She spends nine hours [a day] on her business, from Monday to Saturday. One problem she faces is her small income. She is requesting a loan to purchase more clothes, such as blouses, T-shirts, trousers, etc., for her business. Her plan is to one day build a shop. She is grateful to the lenders who support BRAC Liberia.

loans.use: to purchase more clothes, such as blouses, T-shirts, trousers, etc., for her business.

loans.name: Kadie

texts.en:
This is 42-year-old Kadie from Waterloo in the eastern area in Freetown. She is married with five children between the ages of 1 year and 23 years. She began this business because she wanted to empower her life and children.

Kadie runs a retail business; she sells buckets, soap and palm oil within the community. She has been running this business for the past seven years. She works at the business every day, moving around the community to introduce her business. She says that the main challenge to her business is price inflation.

Kadie has requested a loan in order to purchase items such as palm oil and charcoal. The extra income from this loan will allow her to pay her children's school fees and improve her standard of living. In the future, she plans to open a shop. She appreciates your support.

loans.use: to purchase items such as palm oil and charcoal.

loans.name: Mariatu

texts.en:
This is Mariatu from Waterloo in the eastern area in Freetown. She is in her late 30s. She is married with five children between the ages of 3 years and 18 years. She began this business because she wanted to create a permanent source of income.

Mariatu runs a general store; she sells drinks, cigarettes, biscuits and soap. She has been running this business since three years ago. She works at the business every day, 12 hours per day. She says that the main challenge to her business is price inflation.

Mariatu has requested a loan in order to purchase items such as drinks, cigarettes, biscuits and soap. The extra income from this loan will allow her to pay her children's school fees and change her family's status of living. In the future, she plans to open a shop. She appreciates your support.

loans.use: to purchase items such as drinks, cigarettes, biscuits and soap.

loans.name: Kadiatu

texts.en:
This is Kadiatu from the Waterloo eastern area in Freetown. She is in her late thirties. She is married with 5 children between the ages of 5 years and 25 years. She began this business because she wants to create a permanent source of income.

Kadiatu runs a general store; she sells drinks, cigarettes, biscuits and soap. She began running this business 3 years ago. She works at the business every day, 12 hours per day.  She says that the main challenge to her business is price inflation.

Kadiatu has requested a loan in order to purchase additional inventory. The extra income from this loan will allow her to pay her children's school fees and change her family's standard of living. In the future, she plans to open a shop. She appreciates your support.

loans.use: to purchase items such as drinks, cigarettes, biscuits and soap.

loans.name: Nasuuru

texts.en:
Nasuru is a 29 years-old married man with 2 children living in Fort portal, Uganda. He operates a butcher shop alongside a transport business which has helped him a lot to boost his income. 

He has a vision of expanding his business by starting butcher shops in new areas despite facing the hardship of increased levels of competition. Nasuru will use the loan to buy cows to slaughter and sell.

loans.use: to buy cows to slaughter and sell.

loans.name: Heba

texts.en:
Heba was born in 1982. She lives Amman-Jordan with her 5 children. She has been working in embroidery for 3 years. Heba attends many bazaars. 

She attended a sewing course and got a certificate for practicing her work. She is planning to start rustic embroidery in the future. Heba faced an obstacle with her project which is not having enough supplies available when she receives many requests. Now she is requesting a loan to buy more beads and silk which is needed to fulfill her orders.

loans.use: to buy more beads and silk which is needed to fulfill her orders.

loans.name: Ernesto

texts.en:
Ernesto earns a living through his motorcycle transport business. He is a married man and has five children. They live in Trinidad, Bohol, Philippines. Ernesto has been in this business for more than 3 years now.

Ernesto is asking for a loan to pay for the repair and maintenance of his motorcycle. This will allow him to transport more passengers from one place to another. Ernesto dreams of improving his way of living and hopes of exploring another venture to augment his income. He wants to save money for the schooling of his children.

loans.use: to pay for the repair and maintenance of hid motorcycle

loans.name: Juan Ariel

texts.es: El joven Juan Ariel de 23 años de edad soltero, vive junto a sus padres en la comunidad  de Colomi; económicamente muy independiente.                                                                                                                                                                                                                     Juan Ariel es un joven muy trabajador de una familia humilde se dedica a la producción agrícola con ingresos económicos estacionales por la venta de papa y haba en vaina verde cultiva en terreno propio dentro de 1 ha de terreno en la misma comunidad, aparte de ser agricultor se está dedicando recientemente de ayudante en taller mecánica; mayormente esta los fines de semana con esta actividad  para así poder aprovechar  su tiempo, el joven tuvo gastos en compra de insumos agrícolas y necesita dinero para hacer la obra fina de un cuarto que le dieron sus padres que son de escaso recursos económicos Finalmente el joven se sintió muy feliz por haber tenido esta oportunidad ahora tendrá un cuarto para vivir más cómodo, comenta también que siempre ayudara a sus padres porque a veces no pueden mantener el estudio de sus hermanos menores así para que tengan un futuro mejor que tuvo el joven Juan.
texts.en: Juan Ariel is 23 years old, single, and lives with his parents in the community of Colomi. He is economically independent from them, however. Juan Ariel is a young worker from a humble family who works in agriculture, earning seasonal income selling potatoes and green broad beans that he grows on his own land in the community. Besides being a farmer, he has also recently become an assistant in a mechanic's shop, though he is currently only working there on the weekends so that he can spend his time wisely between his two different jobs. He has expenses in his line of work like buying agricultural stock and he needs additional money to finish a remodeling job that he started on his room so he can live a bit more comfortably there. His parents don't have a lot of money and so he needs to do this himself. He is very happy that he has been given this opportunity to be able to finish his remodeling project and he also tells us that he always helps his parents because, at times, they are not able to take care of his younger siblings when money is tight and he wants them to have a better future than he has been dealt.

loans.use: remodeling his room in his parents' home.

loans.name: Nimatulo

texts.ru: Ниматуло является 57-летним дехканином, проживающим в районе Вахш. У него имеется 10 га земельного участка, на 8 из которых выращивается хлопок, на 1 га арбуз и на 1 га кукуруза. На этой земле работают сам Ниматулло, его жена и старший сын. Двое его средних сыновей работают мигрантами в России, а младший сын и дочь учатся в школе. Четвертый сын Ниматуло - Ёкубчон недавно закончил школу и хочет поступить в Институт. Ёкубчон хочет учиться на таможенника. Отец знает, что его сын способный и умный мальчик и хочет ему помочь. Ниматуло обратился за кредитом. Он хочет оплатить за поступление сына в Налоговый Институт в таможенный факультет. Ниматуло давно мечтал, чтобы из его семьи тоже вышел образованный человек и работал в государственных органах. Теперь он намерен осуществить свою мечту и ждет поддержки.
texts.en: Nimatulo is a 57 year-old cooperative farmer who lives in Vakhsh. He has a 10-hectare plot of land; 8 hectares is planted in cotton, 1 in watermelons, and 1 in corn. Nimatulo himself works this land, along with his wife and older son. His two middle sons are migrant workers in Russia, and his youngest son and daughter are in school. His fourth son, Yokubchon, recently graduated from school and wants to go to college to study to become a customs officer. His father knows that his son is a capable and smart young man and wants to help him. Nimatulo has requested a loan to pay for his son's tuition for the Customs School at the Institute for Taxation. Nimatulo has long dreamed of having someone from his family getting a college education and working for a government agency. Now he wants to fulfll his dream and awaits your assistance.

loans.use: to pay for his son's college tuition

loans.name: Khaled

texts.en: Khaled is 26 years old. He lives in Mafraq, Jordan with his family, which consists of 5 members. Khaled is in his fourth year studying for a Bachelor of Business Administration degree. He is planning to expand his studies to get a master's degree in the future. As Khaled is currently facing financial problems, he is requesting a loan to be able to pay for his school fees.

loans.use: to pay his school fees.

loans.name: Rosario

texts.es: Rosario tiene 64 años está divorciada y vive en su propia casa, aunque tiene 2 hijos independientes. Rosario se dedico al transporte para eso cuenta con un mototaxi, da en alquiler a un chofer quien va  recorriendo las calles de la ciudad de Pucallpa buscando a sus clientes. Le gusta su actividad pues le brinda los ingresos económicos, además de poder manejar su propio tiempo y sentirse independiente. Considera su negocio bastante rentable por la demanda de transporte en la ciudad y las buenas ganancias que le deja. Por tanto tiene planes de ampliar su negocio y crecer, deseando comprarse otra unidad de transporte y así generarse más ingresos económicos. Este será su primer préstamo con Kiva, por tanto espera de su colaboración, para continuar con sus objetivos. Con el monto solicitado 1000 nuevos soles los invertirá en la compra de repuestos para el mantenimiento de su mototaxi.
texts.en: Rosario is 64 years old. She is divorced and lives in her own home, although she does have two children who are on their own. Rosario works in transportation and for that she has a motorcycle taxi. She rents it out to a driver who goes through the streets of the city of Pucallpa seeking customers. She likes this activity because it brings in income and she can manage her own time and feel independent. She considers her business to be very profitable because of the demand for transportation in the city and the good earnings it brings. Because of this, she has plans to expand her business and grow, buying another transportation unit and thus generating more income. This will be her first loan with Kiva and she hopes to have your cooperation to continue with her goals. With the amount of 1000 nuevos soles she has asked for, she will invest in buying replacement parts to do maintenance on her motorcycle taxi.

loans.use: to invest in motorcycle taxi maintenance.

loans.name: Oktam

texts.ru: Октам по профессии учитель. Он работает в двух школах и преподает предмет истории. Ему 53 года. У него жена, трое сыновей и одна дочь. Его жена работает уборщицей в школе. Старший сын студент Медицинского Университета, второй сын студент 2-го курса Государственного университета города Кургантюбе, экономического факультета банковского дела. Младший сын и дочь учатся в школе. Октаму необходимо оплатить за учебу второго сына -  Фаридуна, который учится на экономиста. Он нуждается в деньгах и поэтому обратился за кредитом. Октам считает, что высшее образование является залогом перспективного трудоустройства в будущем и хочет, чтобы все его дети имели высшее образование.
texts.en: Oktam is a teacher by profession. He works in two schools and teaches history. He is 53, married,and has three sons and one daughter. His wife works as a cleaner at a school. His oldest son is a student at the Medical University; his second son is a second year student at Kyrgantyube city university in the banking department of the economics school. His youngest son and daughter are school students. Oktam needs to pay tuition for his second son, Faridun, who is studying economics. He is short of money and has therefore asked for a loan. Oktam considers an advanced degree to be a deposit on future job security for the long-term and wants all of his children to have an advanced education.

loans.use: To pay for his son's college tution

loans.name: Amazing's Group

texts.en:
Amazing is a group composed of three Ghanaian women living in Dansoman-Accra. They decided to join hands and form the group in order to acquire a loan from ID-Ghana, and in order to support each other financially.

Opelia is the featured member of the group. She is a 29-year-old married mother of one child, standing in the center of the photograph. She sells vegetables, maize, and rice. Her husband also owns his own business. However, their combined revenue is not sufficient to provide enough to sustain the family. Furthermore, Ophelia's child is enrolled in a private school, which adds tuition fees on top of the family expenses. She will use her share of the loan to purchase two bags of maize and supplies for her customers, hence expanding her business.

As for the other group members, Aishatu is standing to the left, and Evelyn is standing to the right in the photograph. Together they need a total amount of GHS 3,500 to expand their businesses.

loans.use: to purchase two bags of maize and supply to her customers hence, expand her business.

loans.name: Rustam

texts.ru:
Рустам является хорошим семьянином, женат имеет 3 детей.  Все его дети женаты имеют свою семью. Он в своё время не смог поступить в университет, из-за проблем с деньгами, так как его родители не имели достаточно средств для оплаты за обучение. Тогда он начал работать и помогать отцу торговать на маленькой лавке различными мелочами.  Сейчас Рустам  торгует продовольственными  товарами в магазине.  На его прилавке можно увидеть различные продукты питания, печенье, конфеты, консервы и другое. Он считает что продукты питания реализуются быстрее, так как не имеют сезонный характер.
 Занимаясь этим видом деятельности Рустам  обучил своих детей и дал им достойное образование.  Сейчас он копит денежные средства на ремонт дома. Его дом нуждается в обновлении так как давно не ремонтировался. Но у Рустама не достаточно средств, поэтому он обратился в организацию Арванд за кредитом. Он очень надеется,что в Арванде его финансово поддержат.
texts.en: Rustam is a good family man; he is married and has three children. All of his children have their own families. When he was young, he could not go to college because his parents could not afford to pay for the tuition. He got a job and helped his father sell little odds and ends at a small shop. Now Rustam has a food shop. You can find all kinds of products on his shelves: cookies, candy, preserves, and more. He thinks that food products sell more quickly, because they are in demand year-round. While involved in this business, Rustam taught his children and gave them a decent education. Now he saving money to fix his house, which has not been repaired for a long time and needs some renovation. But he cannot afford to do this, so he has come to Arvand for a loan. He really hopes that Arvand will provide him with financial assistance.

loans.use: to buy building materils

loans.name: Maria

texts.es: María, de 23 años de edad, es casada y vive en compañía de sus 2 hijos en una casa alquilada, desde ahí diariamente se esfuerza para salir adelante y mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia. La actividad que desarrolla María es la agricultura. Tiene un terreno de 6 hectáreas donde siembra cacao y plátano. Su producción lo envía a otras ciudades del Perú y a los mercados de su localidad para ser transformados en chocolate. Tiene la ayuda de su cónyuge y de algunos familiares cuando requiere cumplir con faenas agotadoras que ella sola no podría realizar. Le gusta su trabajo porque le permite estar constantemente en el campo, actualmente desea incrementar su área de siembra, ya que ambos cultivos tienen buena aceptación y el mercado asegurado por el público consumidor. En esta oportunidad solicitará S/. 1300, está muy contenta de saber que tendrá un apoyo financiero, que le permitirá avanzar con su negocio. Por otro lado se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de manera puntual. El monto solicitado lo invertirá en la compra de abono orgánico para sus sembríos.
texts.en:
María is 23 years old, married and lived with her 2 children in a rented home.  Everyday, she works hard to get ahead and improve her family's quality of life.  María works in agriculture.  She has a 6 hectare lot where she plants cacao and plantains.  She sends her produce to other cities in Peru and to the markets in her own town, to be turned into chocolate.  She has the help of her spouse and other family members when she needs to complete grueling tasks that she would not be able to perform on her own. She enjoys her work because it allows her to constantly be outside.

At the moment, she wants to increase her planting area since both crops are well received, and have a guaranteed marker from public consumption.  With this opportunity, she is requesting 1300 nuevo sols.  She is very grateful to know that she will have financial support that will allow her to expand her business.  She is committed to complying with the payments punctually.  She will invest the requested amount in the purchase of organic fertilizer for her crops.

loans.use: purchase organic fertilizer

loans.name: Nicolasa

texts.es: La señora Nicolasa, es una persona de 57 años de edad de estado civil soltera, la señora Nicolasa es analfabeta no sabe leer ni escribir, y no cuenta con dependientes económicos, vive en su propio domicilio de tipo rustico, su domicilio se halla situado en la comunidad de Pocona, su actividad económica es la agricultura en tal sentido menciona que produce anualmente; papa 50 cargas, maíz (choclo) 10 bolsas, achojcha 90 arrobas, arveja (verde) 50 arrobas, haba (verde) 15 cargas. todos estos cultivos los hace producir en sus propios terrenos agrícolas que se encuentran en la misma comunidad, la señora Nicolasa solicita el préstamo para poder alquilarse un terreno agrícola en el cual desarrollar su actividad y producir más, por lo tanto de esa manera tiene el deseo de poder superarse y para tal efecto se ven en la necesidad de solicitar capital inversión y de tal forma con la producción y venta de sus productos mejorar su situación económica y de tal forma también mejorar la calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Nicolasa, 57, is a single woman who never learned to read or write.  She has no dependents and lives in her own rustic-style house in the community of Pocona.  She earns a living as a farmer and produces annually some 50 loads of potatoes, 10 sacks of corn, 90 sacks of achocha plant, 50 sacks of peas and 15 loads of lima beans.  She grows all of these crops on her own land in her community.

The loan being requested by Nicolasa is to rent farm land so she can increase production and improve her situation.  She is in need of investment capital for her business so she can improve her finances and quality of life.

loans.use: To rent farm land.

loans.name: Utama Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “UTAMA”  iniciará el quinto ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Collpani, está compuesta por nueve integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Nancy es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: tienda de barrio, venta de papa, venta de frescos y golosinas, venta de condimentos, venta de gorras, venta de comidas, tejido de mantillas.

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Nancy es integrante, ella indica que hace siete años que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por invitación de su suegra que es socia de la institución. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de venta de gorras; cuenta que este negocio lo aprendió hace varios años atrás, al observar que este producto se vendía ampliamente en el mercado.
 
El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de gorras) que adquirirá de las tiendas distribuidoras de la Ciudad de El Alto, por mayor, y posteriormente lo comercializará en su espacio de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para mantener en lo posible a su hogar pues ella es casada y tiene cuatro hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta las capacitaciones y el crédito.
texts.en:
The communal bank "UTAMA" is beginning its fifth cycle in the Pro Mujer program in the Collpani Social Center.  The group is comprised of nine members and its management board is chaired by Nancy, the president.  The members of the group are involved in different businesses including: a neighborhood store; sales of potatoes, soft drinks and sweets, condiments, hats, food; and blanket weaving.

The loan will benefit small business owners, including Nancy who has been in the Pro Mujer project for seven years.  She joined by invitation from her mother-in-law who is a member of the institution.  Nancy currently sells hats and she learned the trade several years ago when she noticed that there was a good market demand for this product.

She is requesting a loan to increase her work capital buying hats wholesale from distributors in the city of El Alto.  She will then sell them at her stall.  This type of work allows her to generate enough income to cover her household expenses.  She is married and has four children.

When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she says it is the training sessions and loans.

loans.use: To buy hats.

loans.name: Yervacio

texts.es: El Sr. Yervacio sigue con la  misma actividad de transporte y venta de material de construcción ya que se encarga de trasladar material de construcción a distintas obras de la ciudad de La Paz, cuenta que le fue bien con el anterior crédito ya que lo utilizo en la compra de llantas para su camión,  en esta ocasión solicita el crédito para mantenimiento de su camión ya que esta presentando algunas fallas y esto por el peso que transporta puede ocasionar un accidente , este es el motivo de su crédito , el Sr. Yervacio se siente agradecido por esta oportunidad que le vuelven a dar ya que así mejora en su actividad y también  en sus ingresos económicos.
texts.en:
Yervacio continues in the same transport business and selling construction materials.  He takes construction materials to different building sites around the city of La Paz.  He says he used the previous loan to buy tires for his truck.

On this occasion, he is requesting a loan to pay for vehicle maintenance since his truck is beginning to show signs of failure and this could be dangerous given the weight he carries.  

Yervacio is grateful for this new opportunity to improve his business and income.

loans.use: To pay for vehicle maintenance.

loans.name: Marlinda

texts.es: Marlinda, de 44 años de edad, es madre soltera de 6 hijos pero solo vive con dos de sus hijas y sus nietas. La actividad que realiza Marlinda es la agricultura, tiene un terreno de 10 hectáreas las cuales  ha destinado a la siembra de cultivos, contando con 8 hectáreas de cacao y 1 hectárea de plátano, el terreno restante esta orientado a la crianza de animales. Comenta que le gusta la vida de campo, además conoce el ritmo del trabajo y como ejecutarlo ya que desde muy joven cumplió esta función con ayuda de sus padres. Sin embargo, asegura que el cansancio físico es constante ya que es un trabajo que exige mucho esfuerzo, a pesar de ello le llena de satisfacción los ingresos económicos que percibe ya que eso le permite tener el dinero necesario para darle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia por lo que espera seguir trabajando de la misma forma. En esta oportunidad solicitará S/. 1000, está muy emocionada al saber que hay personas que le brindan un respaldo económico para continuar desarrollando su actividad laboral, así mismo se compromete a ser una socia puntual y responsable. El monto solicitado lo invertirá en abono orgánico para sus sembríos.
texts.en:
Marlinda, who is 44 years old, is a single mother of 6 children, but she only lives with two of her children and her grandchildren. Marlinda works in agriculture. She has 10 hectares of land, which is dedicated to the growth of crops. She has 8 hectares of cacao, 1 hectare of bananas, and she uses the rest of the land to raise animals.

She says that she likes living in the country since she knows the rhythm of the work and how to execute it because she has been doing it since she was young with the help of her parents. Nonetheless, she reports that she is constantly physically exhausted because the work requires a lot of effort. In spite of this, the income that she receives makes her very satisfied because it allows her to have the money necessary to give her family a better quality of life. This is why she hopes to continue working in the same manner.

At this time, she requests a loan of 1,000 Nuevos Soles. She is very excited to find out that there are people who will give her the economic support to continue to develop her work. She promises to be a punctual and responsible associate. The loan that she has requested will be invested in organic manure for her fields.

loans.use: to buy organic manure for her fields.

loans.name: Roberto

texts.es: El señor Roberto, es una persona trabajadora se dedica a la agricultura (tiene plantaciones de naranja), a la crianza de pescados y en sus días libres se dedica al servicio de transporte; trabaja todos los días para mantener a sus cuatro hijos y a su querida concubina, ni aun así le alcanza dinero para los estudios de sus hijos, para su alimentación, mantenimiento de su chaco y mantenimiento de su vehiculo, por tal motivo el señor solicita que se le haga un financiamiento para que pueda ampliar sus cítricos y así poder mejorar sus ingresos económicos para que a su familia no le falte alimentación ni ropa y que para que siempre estén en buena salud y que sus  hijos puedan estudiar sin que les falte nada.
texts.en:
Roberto is a hardworking person who earns a living from farming (he grows oranges) and breeding fish and on his free days he provides a transportation service. He works every day to support his four children and his beloved partner but even so he doesn't have enough money for his children's education and food and for the upkeep of his farm and maintenance of his vehicle. 

For this reason Roberto is asking for a loan so he can increase the number of his citrus trees and so improve his income so that his family has enough food and clothing, so they always have good health and so that his children can study and not have to go without anything.

loans.use: to increase the number of his citrus trees.

loans.name: Jorge Iván

texts.es: Jorge a sus 48 años de edad se dedica a la ebanistería y tapicería de muebles, actividad con la cual obtiene ingresos para aportar económicamente en su hogar, donde vive con su madre, ya que no es casado y no ha tenido hijos. Es un hombre emprendedor y le gusta estar en constante actividad para sentirse útil, por lo que se motiva para solicitar su primer crédito, con el fin de invertirlo en el pago de un curso de capacitación en elaboración de Tortas, Batidos y Galletas, ya que ve en esto una oportunidad de negocio rentable y sostenible en el tiempo. Jorge sueña con hacer crecer su negocio de ebanistería y a mediano plazo poder aumentar sus ingresos con el montaje de un negocio de  panificación y repostería, para así mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Jorge, 48, is a carpenter and furniture upholsterer.  He contributes his income to the home he shares with his mother since he is single and has no children.  He is an entrepreneur who always wants to be active and feel useful; and therefore he is requesting his first loan to pay for a course in making cakes, milk-shakes and cookies.  He sees this business opportunity as being profitable and sustainable over time.

Jorge's goal is to expand his carpentry business and increase his income, in the medium term, by setting up a bakery business.  His aim is to improve his quality of life.

loans.use: To pay for a cake, milk-shake and cookie making training course.

loans.name: Marisela

texts.es: Marisela tiene 31 años, está divorciada y vive en la casa de sus padres junto sus 3 hijos. Marisela se dedica al transporte para esto cuenta con un mototaxi. Tiene 03 años dedicándose a éste negocio y cuenta con el apoyo de su padre en la administración de sus recursos. Le gusta su negocio pues le genera un ingreso económico y se siente una persona productiva con los gastos del hogar. Tiene planes de incursionar en otro negocio como abrir una tienda de venta de repuestos de motos. Este será su primer préstamo con Kiva. Por ello espera de su colaboración para que pueda concretar sus planes. Con el monto de 1000 nuevos soles los invertirá en compra de repuestos para el mantenimiento de sus unidades como llantas, aceites y otros.
texts.en:
Marisela, 31, is divorced and lives with her parents and her three children.  She is in the transport business and owns a motor-taxi.  For three years she has been working in this trade with the support of her father who handles the administrative part of her resources.  She enjoys what she does because it generates an income and makes her feel like a productive person when it comes to paying for household expenses.

Marisela has plans to open another business, such as a motorcycle spare parts store. This is her first Kiva loan and she is counting on you to help so she can carry out her plans.  The  loan in the amount of 1,000 PEN will be used to buy spare parts such as tires, oil and other maintenance supplies.

loans.use: To buy tires, oil and other supplies for transport vehicle maintenance.

loans.name: Marina Luz

texts.es: La Sra. Marina sigue con la actividad de la venta de cosméticos y joyas, cuenta que le fue bien con el anterior crédito ya que lo utilizo en la compra de colonia y perfumes al por mayor que se encuentra en promoción, cuenta que le fue bien  creció en su actividad e incremento su clientela, y por ende sus ingresos económicos, en esta ocasión solicito el crédito para la compra de cosméticos y joyaspor mayor para seguir incrementando su capital de trabajo, se siente feliz y agradecida por esta nueva oportunidad que le brindan.
texts.en:
Marina continues with her business selling cosmetics and jewelry.  She says that everything went well with her previous loan, and that she used it to buy cologne and perfume wholesale during a promotional sale.  She has grown her business, her customer base, and therefore her income.  

On this occasion, she is requesting a loan in order to purchase cosmetics and jewelry wholesale so that she can continue growing her working capital.  She feels happy and thankful for this new opportunity that has been offered to her.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics and jewelry wholesale.

loans.name: Zahreya

texts.en:
Zahreya was born in 1965. She is divorced and lives with her two sons in Zarqa, Jordan. Her sons work in selling fruits and vegetables. 

Zahreya has been working in trading clothes and blankets for four years. She started her project at home by buying small merchandise. Then she started expanding her project after having a good number of customers, which was profitable to her. 

Now she is requesting a loan to expand her project more and to buy more clothes and blankets to trade and increase her income.

loans.use: To buy more clothes and blankets to sell.

loans.name: Ghazal

texts.en:
Ghazal is 20 years old. She lives in Irbid, Jordan, with her family, which consists of seven members. 

Ghazal is studying Diploma of Accounting, first year. She is planning to work in her study field after her graduation. 

Ghazal doesn’t have enough money to pay for her study fees, so she is requesting a loan to be able to pay for it.

loans.use: To cover her study fees.

loans.name: Khitam

texts.en:
Khitam was born in 1958. She is a widow who lives in Amman, Jordan. 

Khitam has a mini market that she started two years ago. She started her project by buying foods and cleaners. Then she expanded her project by increasing her merchandise and sales. 

Now she is requesting a loan to buy new foods, cleaners and more products to increase her sales and income.

loans.use: To buy new foods, cleaners and more products.

loans.name: Huda

texts.en:
Huda is a conservative woman so her husband is photographed in the picture.

Huda is a 43-year-old married woman. She is a mother to four sons and three daughters; they are university students. They are living in Tulkarem in a very humble house. For the past ten years, Huda’s husband has been a dentist. He has a dentist clinic which has been a profitable project, but also needs more support to cover the family's needs. Huda’s husband also has another source of income. 

Huda is requesting a 2,000 USD loan from FATEN to help her husband to improve the dentist clinic by buying new equipment and chair to be better and more profitable. This will affect Huda’s husband's income in a positive way.

loans.use: to buy new equipment and chair for the dental clinic

loans.name: Benito

texts.es: Don benito es una persona de escasos recursos económicos debido a que el lugar y la propiedad donde vive se encuentra a orillas del rio por tanto los terrenos son pequeños y de alto riesgo a las fuertes turbulencias de agua que se presenta y los desbordes que ocasiona, en pasada gestión agrícola don benito ha sufrido el desborde del mencionado río dejándole con un 50% de sus tierras agrícolas totalmente erosionadas llenos de piedra y desnivelación de la capa arable, por las razones descritas su producción ha bajado afectando en los rendimientos por tanto los ingresos económicos han sido también afectados por estas razones descritas don benito ha recurrido al préstamo kiva siendo esta la primera vez que solicita, con este crédito comprará semillas de buena calidad  para realizar sus actividades económicas para estabilizarse.
texts.en:
Benito is a person with very limited resources owing to the fact that the property and land where he lives is situated on the banks of a river. This means his plots of land are small and at high risk from the strong turbulence of the water and the occasions when the river bursts its banks. In previous growing seasons Benito has suffered from overflows from the river leaving 50% of his agricultural land completely eroded and full of stones and leaving the arable layer uneven. For the reasons described his production has decreased, affecting the yields and so Benito's income has also been affected.

For this reason Benito has turned to Kiva to ask for a loan for the first time. He will use the loan to buy good quality seeds to work with so he can get back to normal.

loans.use: to buy seeds.

loans.name: Sofia

texts.es:
Sofía tiene 62 años, está casada y vive en su casa propia junto su esposo, y tiene hijos ya independientes.
Sofía  se dedica a la venta de comidas regionales. Realiza la preparación en su casa y los entrega en la empresa a su hora de refrigerio. Tiene más de 10 años dedicándose a éste negocio, y hasta el momento su hija  mayor  la apoya, con la entrega de los alimentos preparados y consiguiéndole nuevos clientes.
Le gusta su negocio pues le genera un ingreso económico, y le permite tener un ocupación y sentirse un apersonas productiva. Por tanto tiene planes de continuar en el negocio y en un futuro poder abrir un restaurante en su casa. Esto será su primer préstamo con Kiva. Por tanto espera de un pequeño préstamo para que pueda cumplir con sus objetivos. 
Con el monto de 500 nuevos soles, los invertirá en  la compra de los ingredientes necesarios para la preparación de sus alimentos como arroz, aceites y otros.
texts.en:
Sofía is 62 years old and married. She lives in her own home with her husband, and her children are now adult.
Sofía makes a living selling regional foods. She prepares them in her house and delivers them to the company when it is time to refrigerate them. She has been in this business for more than ten years, with the help of her eldest daughter, who delivers the prepared foods and pursues new customers.
She likes this business because it gives her economic resources and allows her to keep busy and feel productive. She therefore plans to keep the business going and in the future open a restaurant in her home. This is her first loan with Kiva. She hopes for a small loan to help her meet her goals.
